subject: Ref Number :  / FB / 024 / 007
body:
Ref Number :  / FB / 024 / 007 / 2023
Date: 01 / 19 / 2024
Dear Facebook / Meta Winner - xxx,
I am sorry for the late in response to your last email, this was due to Christmas and new year vacation. Once again your email was randomly selected via Automated Database Random selection Program ( FACEBOOK USERS ) of Accounts that frequently surf the Internet wherein after a careful selection process, your email was shortlisted among the lucky individuals who qualified to receiving the winning prize of the sum of One Million United State Dollars ( $1,000,000.00 USD ).  Your winnings / fund is loaded  in an Atm Master Card value for $1,000,000.00 USD ( One Million United States Dollars )
Note - kindly find attached testimonial videos of beneficiary winners like you below. They already comply and receive their winnings / funds via ATM Card. I implore you to do the same and be rest assured your Atm Card will get to you accordingly.
Congratulations.
Regards
Zanita Ward

subject: Re: Ref Number :  / FB / 024 / 007
body:
Hello Zanita Ward,

Thank you for your email and congratulations to me! I'm really excited about this. It's a great way to start the new year, isn't it? 

I watched the videos of the other winners and they seem very happy. Can you tell me more about how they received their winnings? Did they have to go somewhere to collect it or was it delivered to them?

Also, I'm curious about how my email was selected. Can you explain more about this Automated Database Random selection Program? How often does it run and how many people usually win?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Jennifer
